part.Name: Description
part.Short: これは扉である。詩に反抗して立っている。

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODO]A wood storage box with a hinged lid and latch. Notches scratched on the surface hint at the full probability array of language, and also its absence.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: [届：\TODO]A length of brinestalk is wrapped in oil-sodden cloth.
